pageProduct.name: Oral B Toothpaste 3D White Teeth Whitening Therapy Sensitivity Care 95g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy goes beyond whitening, it's therapy for your teeth.

The Active Mineral Complex helps to gently whiten by removing up to 95% of surface stains in 3 days.

Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy is proven enamel safe.

The fluoride formula helps to remineralise weakened enamel.

General Information

• Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy Sensitivity Care Toothpaste gently whitens teeth and relieves sensitivity pain
• The 3D White Therapy Collection is formulated with an Active Mineral Complex
• The Sensitivity Care formula soothes sensitivity pain and gently polishes to beautifully whiten teeth

Warnings

Tube has been foil sealed for your protection. Do not use if seal on tube is broken or missing. For children 7 to 12 years of age, use only on the advice of a dentist or doctor. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. Do not use this product in children 6 years of age or less. Do not swallow. If sensitivity symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 6 years of age or less. For children 7 to 12 years of age, use only on the advice of a dentist or doctor. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. If sensitivity symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Purified Water, Silicon Dioxide, Glycerol, Sorbitol Solution (70 percent) (Crystallising), Potassium Nitrate, Tribasic Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavour, Carmellose Sodium, Saccharin Sodium, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Polysorbate 80, Titanium Dioxide.

Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride 0.321% w/w; Potassium Nitrate 5% w/w.

Contains: Sodium Fluoride (1450 ppm Fluoride) Contains Saccharin.

Directions

Adults and children 6 years & older apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist. Make sure to brush all sensitive areas of the teeth.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
